name: one-mln-pixels
description: This project is a clone of the one of the modules in rsk-dev-course. It was audited by the RSK security team priorly and there was no high or critical issues raised during the audit. So we assume currently the code doesn't contain any vulnerabilities. Instead of finding vulnerabilities (let us know if you find one!), what we want from you is to introduce one or multiple vulnerabilities to the smart contracts.
